oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Jim Key writing his name
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Beautiful Jim Key was an intelligent horse who performed for nine years around the country to large crowds at expositions, world's fairs, schools, and other venues. He demonstrated his ability to read, write, spell, and in this photograph, sort mail.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Animals in human situations -- 1890-1900; Animals in human situations -- 1900-1910
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Beautiful Jim Key is pictured writing his name on a chalk board.
